Directions

From Wexford, take the m25 towards Rosslare. Take a right hand turn for Johnstown Castle and Gardens. When you pass the entrance to Johnstown, exactly a mile further, on the top of the hill, take a left at the crossroads.

Continue straight, keeping the school on your left, keep left at the fork in the road and you will be at Kosy Kennels entrance exactly a mile from the school.

Kosy Kennels
